parts.name: Blade
parts.Basic_description: It's the blade of a folding knife made of stainless steel.
parts.Functional_description: It is the cutting component of the knife, used for slicing or piercing.
parts.Movement_description: It rotates about an axis relative to the handle to open or close the knife.

parts.name: Handle
parts.Basic_description: It's the handle of a folding knife made of plastic.
parts.Functional_description: It provides a grip for the user to hold and control the knife.
parts.Movement_description: It serves as the base for the rotating blade, allowing it to fold in and out.
